Texts.Chs: 任何一个有自尊心的科学家都会有一个^orange;物质萃取器^reset;。它就好像魔法一般，把东西放进去就会有更棒的物质出来！快点在^orange;自动组装器^reset;做一个吧。
Texts.Eng: Any self-respecting scientist has an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. It's like sorcery! Stuff goes in, better stuff comes out! Make one in your ^orange;Auto-Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;物质萃取器^reset;带给这名^green;人类科学家^reset;。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; to the ^green;Human Scientist^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 当涉及到使用这个东西的时候，你将会有无限的选择。现在你可以尝试去建造一些科学实验室了，例如^orange;生化试验台^reset;。
Texts.Eng: You'll have limitless options when it comes to using that thing. Try building some other science stations now, such as a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset;.
